properties.Name: FinancialStatementLine
properties.Description: A line (row) of a financial statement. Each row will contain values that are representative of the attributes associated with the line.

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementLineId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement Line.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementLineText
Columns.Description: The text that appears in the first column of each line.

Columns.Name: TextIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates whether the values presented on the line will contain text.

Columns.Name: NumericIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates whether the values presented on the line will be numeric.

Columns.Name: PercentageIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates whether the values presented on the line will contain percentages.
